hymn.title: Lord Jesus Christ, we seek Thy face

layout.singingstanza: Lord Je -- sus Christ, we seek Thy face; With -- in the veil we bow the knee; Oh, let Thy glo -- ry fill the place, And bless us while we wait on Thee.

hymn.copyright: Used by permission of Pickering & Inglis, Ltd.

lyrics.stanza: We thank Thee for the precious blood That purged our sins and brought us nigh; All cleansed and sanctified to God, Thy holy name to magnify.
Shut in with Thee far, far above The restless world that wars below; We seek to learn and prove Thy love, Thy wisdom and Thy grace to know.
The brow that once with thorns was bound Thy hands, Thy side, we fain would see; Draw near, Lord Jesus, glory crowned, And bless us while we wait on Thee.
